title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: The popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not appearing.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, no menu pops up for adding breakpoints or marks.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. This should display a menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, the menu is not appearing.
SR: 1) Open Eclipse Photon. 2) Open a Java file in the Java editor. 3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Observe that no menu is displayed.
